description: A Karnataka SIT has charged seven individuals, including former BJP MLA Subhash Guttedar, in a 'vote chori' case involving alleged illegal deletion of 5,994 voters in Aland constituency. This follows earlier claims by Rahul Gandhi, which the Election Commission had dismissed as baseless, stating no online deletions are possible without due process.

title: Watch: Political fronts on edge as vote counting in Kerala local body election progresses
description: The results of the 2025 Kerala local body polls will be declared today. Counting of ballots cast by over two crore voters is taking place at 244 centres and 14 district collectorates. Vote counting began at 8 a.m., according to the State Election Commission. The results are expected to shape the future course of campaigning by political parties and fronts in the State ahead of the 2026 Kerala Assembly elections.

title: Nicki Minaj in MAGA era: Singer slams Newsom over trans rights; applauds Trump
description: Nicki Minaj has intensified her political shift to the right, criticizing California Governor Gavin Newsom's pro-trans statements. She accused him of exploiting trans children for political gain, comparing him unfavorably to J.D. Vance. This follows Minaj's previous alignment with anti-trans rhetoric from the Trump administration.

title: Rs 3,600 crore project: Haryana ties up with World Bank to cut pollution
description: Haryana has launched its most ambitious environmental initiative, the 'Haryana Clean Air Project for Sustainable Development,' in collaboration with the World Bank, with a Rs 3,600 crore corpus. This project aims to significantly improve air quality over five years through sweeping interventions, including industrial upgrades, e-bus procurement, and enhanced monitoring infrastructure.

description: Prime Minister Narendra Modi and other leaders across parties paid solemn tribute to security personnel martyred in the 2001 Parliament terror attack.  Remembering their bravery and sacrifice, the nation reaffirmed its unwavering stance against terrorism.  The attack, which claimed 14 lives, was a stark reminder of the threats faced by the "temple of democracy."

description: Nvidia faces significant hurdles selling enterprise AI software, particularly to finance and healthcare clients. Internal emails reveal a "fundamental disconnect" with legal and procurement teams over data security and indemnity. Despite these challenges, software sales projections remain optimistic, with NVAIE exceeding targets, highlighting Nvidia's push for recurring revenue beyond hardware.

title: Parking lot shooting in Canada: 3 Indian-origin men arrested - police share footage
description: Three Indian-origin men were arrested in Brampton, Canada, following a shooting in a parking lot linked to a tow-truck dispute. Peel Regional Police identified the accused as Manjot Bhatti, Navjot Bhatti, and Amanjot Bhatti. The investigation is ongoing, with police seeking an additional suspect.

description: Pakistani Prime Minister Shehbaz Sharif faced online criticism on Friday after video alleged that he entered a closed-door meeting between Russian President Vladimir Putin and Turkish President Recep Tayyip Erdogan, at the International Forum for Peace and Trust in Ashgabat, Turkmenistan. The video was later deleted, claiming that it may have been a "misrepresentation of the events".

title: Indians on board: Iran seizes oil tanker in Gulf of Oman
description: Iran has seized an oil tanker in the Gulf of Oman. The vessel carried six million litres of diesel fuel. Eighteen crew members from India, Sri Lanka, and Bangladesh were on board. This incident highlights ongoing tensions in the region. Strategic waterways remain a focus for maritime control and international shipping.

description: Deportation proceedings are underway for Birch By Romeo Lane owners, Saurabh and Gaurav Luthra, following a devastating fire that killed 25 in Goa. Detained in Thailand after their passports were suspended, the brothers are being coordinated for handover to Indian law enforcement. Goa's Chief Minister vows justice for the victims.

title: Families who escaped 1984 anti-Sikh riots fear displacement again in Mohali
‘Trillions rolling in’: Why Trump’s massive tariffs haven’t resolved American woes
description: President Trump touts rising government revenues and investment pledges as proof of his economic strategy's success. However, many Americans face affordability pressures, creating a disconnect between headline growth and personal finances. Critics argue that while tariffs have increased, they haven't significantly eased cost-of-living strains for households.

title: 'He won't be India's captain... ': Suryakumar Yadav gets big warning | IND vs SA
description: India's T20I captain Suryakumar Yadav is under scrutiny for a significant dip in form, having gone 20 innings without a fifty. Former batter Aakash Chopra emphasized the captain's primary role is to score runs, especially with the T20 World Cup approaching. Both Yadav and vice-captain Shubman Gill's consistent performances are deemed crucial for the team's confidence.

title: Kis Kisko Pyaar Karoon 2 Box Office Collection: Kapil Sharma’s comedy gets off to a slow start, earns Rs 1.75 crore
Bahraich murder: Court says must instil fear in such 'beasts'; sentences accused to death
description: A Bahraich court handed down the death penalty to the main accused in a communal violence murder case, citing the Manusmriti to justify severe punishment. The judge described the killing of a 22-year-old man as "extreme barbarity" involving "demonic torture." The verdict emphasized that fear of punishment is crucial for maintaining social order and public trust in the justice system.

title: Aishwarya's hydrating routine that keeps her glowing at 52
description: Aishwarya Rai Bachchan, at 52, reveals her secret to timeless radiance isn't complex routines but simplicity.  She emphasizes early mornings, staying hydrated, and maintaining hygiene.  Moisturizing daily, a habit since her career began, is crucial.  Her approach highlights that glowing skin and graceful aging stem from consistent, basic self-care and inner confidence, proving a busy life can still be radiant.

title: Rahul Gandhi to meet Lionel Messi in Hyderabad
description: Rahul Gandhi will watch the football match between Messi XI and Chief Minister Revanth Reddy’s XI, which is scheduled to take place during the evening hours

title: Single watchdog for higher education: What Viksit Bharat Shiksha Adhikshan Bill sets in motion
description: India is set to overhaul higher education regulation with the Viksit Bharat Shiksha Adhikshan Bill, consolidating multiple bodies into a single authority. This move aims to simplify governance, enhance academic quality, and shift focus from permissions to outcomes. While promising greater institutional autonomy and clearer standards for students, concerns about centralization and effective implementation remain.

Rs 2cr, diamond rings and more: Businessman and DSP Kalpana Verma's family at loggerheads
description: Raipur police are investigating counter-complaints between a businessman and a woman DSP. The DSP's family alleges the businessman extorted over Rs 2 crore, while the businessman's wife claims the DSP refused to return expensive items. No FIR has been filed, with parties advised to approach the court.

title: Indian-origin millionaire tried setting US winery on fire; crashed Tesla
description: An Indian-origin entrepreneur, Beri Vikram, was arrested in Saratoga, California, after allegedly attempting to start a fire, throwing a wine bottle, and crashing his Tesla into two parked cars at a winery. Vikram, founder of BetterLYF Wellness, was apprehended by deputies after resisting arrest and was subsequently charged with assault with a deadly weapon and resisting arrest.

description: Vote counting for Kerala's 1,199 local bodies commenced with postal ballots, followed by EVMs. Initial trends showed the ruling LDF, opposition UDF, and NDA leading across various local government tiers. The results are crucial for shaping strategies ahead of the 2026 Assembly elections.

title: iPhone 17, Google Gemini, DeepSeek and others: Tech that Pakistan Googled most in 2025
description: Google's Year in Search 2025 report reveals Pakistan's top searches, with AI bots like Gemini and Deepseek dominating technology queries. Cricket, local news, and dramas also featured prominently, alongside athlete Abhishek Sharma and popular recipes. "How-to" searches covered diverse topics from e-challans to crypto investments.

Brady's words focused on the lives Cena touched, both inside and outside the wrestling ring. This recognition goes beyond titles and scripted moments. It celebrates Cena's consistency and accountability.

John Cena shocks WWE officials with emotional off-script moment on live Netflix broadcast
description: Wrestling icon John Cena surprised WWE officials and fans by going off-script during a Netflix broadcast, presenting a handwritten tribute to rival AJ Styles. Cena later apologized, admitting he acted alone without approval, emphasizing his respect for the company's creative process. This unexpected moment highlights his emotional retirement tour as he nears his final match.

title: Gujarat Confidential: Research Ready
Lionel Messi India tour: Full itinerary, cities, venues and key events
description: Football legend Lionel Messi's arrival in India for the GOAT India Tour 2025 has ignited unprecedented fan fervor. Thousands greeted him, showcasing immense popularity. The tour includes fan engagements, football events, and high-profile meetings across Kolkata, Hyderabad, Mumbai, and Delhi, culminating in a meeting with Prime Minister Narendra Modi.

title: Delhi battles heavy smog: Airport issues advisory; passengers told to contact airlines
description: Delhi's Indira Gandhi International Airport is operating normally despite heavy smog and poor visibility, with low visibility procedures in effect. Air quality in the capital has plunged to 'very poor' levels, with dense fog expected to persist. Residents are advised to limit outdoor activities as the city faces another challenging winter smog episode.

title: Stablecoins unstable, pose major fin risks: RBI deputy governor
description: RBI Deputy Governor T Rabi Sankar warned that stablecoins pose significant macro-financial risks, including currency substitution and weakened monetary policy. He argued they lack the essential features of modern money, such as fiat status and singleness, and could undermine India's financial architecture. Sankar highlighted that their purported benefits are largely unproven, with domestic systems already offering superior payment solutions.

title: UNESCO meet in India ends on Saturday, China to play host to ICH panel session next year
description: The closing ceremony was hosted on Friday evening by India at the temporary pavilion, Plenary Hall, at the fort complex, as delegates will head out for sightseeing on Saturday after days of intense discussion

title: UCC, anti-conversion, land laws in Dhami government booklet on completion of 4 years
description: The booklet — 'Dhami Ki Dhamak - 4 Saal Bemisal' (Dhami's impact - four years of excellence) — was released by Chief Minister Pushkar Singh Dhami

title: ‘Mohabbat hai’: Messi mania grips Kolkata; couple cancel honeymoon to see football icon
description: A newlywed couple postponed their honeymoon to witness Lionel Messi's arrival in Kolkata, highlighting the immense excitement for his GOAT India Tour 2025. Thousands of fans braved the cold, lining up outside Salt Lake Stadium to greet the football superstar, who arrived early Saturday morning amidst tight security.

title: Messi in Kolkata: Thousands turn out to welcome Argentine icon - See pics
description: Lionel Messi's 'GOAT India Tour 2025' kicked off in Kolkata with thousands braving the cold for a midnight welcome. Despite tight security, fans experienced 'Messi mania' as the football icon arrived for a whirlwind tour across four cities, meeting dignitaries and participating in events.

title: 'India is a key partner': US lawmakers urge to scrap 50% tariff; warn of economic fallout
description: US lawmakers are pushing to remove steep tariffs on Indian imports, arguing they harm American jobs and consumers. A resolution seeks to end President Trump's national emergency declaration that led to duties up to 50%. This bipartisan move aims to mend the vital US-India partnership and boost economic ties, citing disruptions and increased costs for Americans.

description: India's 14-year-old cricket sensation, Vaibhav Suryavanshi, has become the nation's most searched personality on Google, even surpassing Virat Kohli. His remarkable 171 off 95 balls in the U19 Asia Cup propelled him to global fame. Despite the immense attention, Suryavanshi remains grounded, focusing solely on his game and taking the newfound popularity in stride.

title: Johnson & Johnson ordered to pay $40 million in baby powder cancer case
description: A California jury ordered Johnson & Johnson to pay $40 million to two women who claimed its talc-based baby powder caused their ovarian cancer. The women testified that decades of use led to major surgeries and chemotherapy. Johnson & Johnson plans to appeal, stating the verdict is aberrant and lacks evidence.

title: In terror acts, rights of accused subservient to national interest: Supreme Court
description: The Supreme Court has ruled that individual liberty, while crucial, cannot override national security concerns in UAPA cases. The apex court stressed the need for expeditious trials in such grave matters.
